title: patcher at 33%
body:
I keep crashing on what seems to be 158 files scanned for the update. 
http://i.imgur.com/pBA9Str.png
http://i.imgur.com/kA9wtXu.png
http://i.imgur.com/yosNMRA.png

replies.body: At this step, the patcher is trying to download updates but a network issue is preventing it.  Your best bet would be to go through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve whatever is causing the connection to fail.  This should get you fixed up!
